message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a very reasonable price of $20,000. I know you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can we meet in the middle at $14,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle at $17,000?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $14,000, so I'm thinking $15,000 is a fair price. Can we agree on that?
